This is a great activity dinner...you must be a foodie to appreciate.  Really interesting presentation of everything with a huge focus on Catalonia wine and food...Lorena is one of the unique wait staff in the world that is so passionate about her job it's inspiring.  The service was outstanding...if you've never seen a napkin perfectly folded using only a spoon and fork, you're in for a treat.  You'll also get a history lesson on Catalan food with excellent presentation.  Our only complaint and reason for 4 stars was the wine pairing.  Almost exclusively wines from Catalonia, they were definitely underwhelming with the sherry not really drinkable (I admit I'm not a sherry guy).  Not cheap but definitely unique.
